mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA_COMMENT (QN_ANSWER_NO, USER_NO, CREATE_DATE, QN_NO, QNA_TYPE, QA_ANSWER, QUESTION_NUM) SELECT SEQ_QACOMMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL, SYSDATE, 0, 'profile-comment', '', LEVEL FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 5
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NICKNAME, USER_NAME, PHONE, ENROLLDATE, GENDER, ADDRESS, IMAGES, USER_POINT, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS ='Y'
